author: milos88
content: You can read more about Portal Network on https://ethportal.net/ , but majority of Portal Network is no longer actively maintained/reseearched. The only part that is currently worked on is integration of modified history network inside (some) execution clients.

author: milos88
content: Check recent messages for most up-to-date status

author: milos88
content: And there is no other rust client (other then trin).
